AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Delinquent Mechanic
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a delinquent living at Hidalgo Ranch outside Mexico City. He was a good shooter and mechanic, both of which occasionally got him in trouble with the law, although his family mostly kept him in line.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Mexican Gunslinger
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] started to become known and feared as the "Ghost of Mexico City", and while his reputation sometimes drove off trouble, it would end up causing them most of the time, as his antics began to attract the attention of glory seekers. Though this worried him, [PAWN_nameDef] noticed how the outfit kept his sister happy, so [PAWN_nameDef] kept wearing it and his legend in the area continued to grow.
